turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. We're having an office party, and I want to get some pizzas for pickup from Bella Luna. Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a set of four-medium-thin crust pizzas. I want two of them with sausage and pepperoni, one with the onions, and one with broccoli.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium thin crust pizzas, 2 sausage and pepperoni, 1 onion, and 1 broccoli, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, all thin crust. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I'll go pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it. You're the best. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizza and party.
